jd: From: Gaurav Nain, sibitalent.com g.nain@sibitalent.com Reply to: g.nain@sibitalent.com Job Title - Senior GCP cloud consultantVisa :: No H1B/CPT/OPTLocation :: RemoteExperience :: 10+ years Note:- Need very strong candidate Job Description:- REQUIREMENTS FOR CONSIDERATION: • 8+ years of experience in data engineering, with a focus on GCP technologies. • Proficiency in Google Cloud Platform leveraging Google Data Flow, Data Proc, , Composer, Pub/Sub, BigQuery, GCS, Cloud function, define workflows, scheduled and event driven jobs. • Experience in building and maintaining data pipelines using Python and PySpark (GCP Dataproc). • Strong experience with BigQuery including SQL and Stored Procedures. • Experience with NoSQL databases and building apps using NoSQL databases. • Hands-on experience with end to end data Ingestion pipeline – realtime and batch, kafka and/or other tools, Databricks will be nice to have. - ALL NICE TO HAVE NOT NUST HAVE • Familiarity with REST APIs and microservices architecture (nice to have, not must have) • Experience with high-volume data processing (GB-level). • Previous experience working in a similar role with GCP stack technologies. • In-depth understanding of Big Data ecosystems underlying architectures to re-platform legacy systems and build integration solutions on Google Cloud platform. • Have a passion for new technologies, continuous improvement and actively involved with the team to design new data solutions, monitoring and alerting policies for data solutions. • Experience in data quality, continuous integrations build and deployment processes using Docker, GitHub, Jenkins and Unix/Linux shell scripts. • Hands on experience developing complex services/solutions based on Enterprise Integration Patterns and Coding best practices. • Proactive and able to catch issues before failures. • Possess a strong work ethic; takes pride in producing a quality product and a strong team player • Work with production support and project consultants in an onshore / offshore model
